name: Overthrow!
description:
The king has become corrupt! As an ex-knight, you must now overthrow the king. You have brought your weapon that all knights and kings uses across the land, the most obvious of them all... A GUN!

 

Overthrow! is a game with quick reactions and fun shooting aspects containing a wacky combo of modern and medieval. Along the way, you can collect gems on the side to complete it 100%.
